references.paper_title: Brain-mamba: Encoding brain activity via selective state space models
references.reason: This paper introduces Brain-Mamba, a novel model for encoding brain activity, which is highly relevant to the current paper's focus on multivariate time series modeling.

references.paper_title: Effectively modeling time series with simple discrete state spaces
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel method for effectively modeling time series using simple discrete state spaces, which directly relates to the core methodology of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Efficiently modeling long sequences with structured state spaces
references.reason: This paper presents a significant advance in modeling long sequences using structured state spaces, a technique central to the current paper's approach.

references.paper_title: Mamba: Linear-time sequence modeling with selective state spaces
references.reason: Mamba, introduced in this paper, is a highly efficient linear-time sequence modeling method that directly inspired the architecture of the model presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: A 2-dimensional state space layer for spatial inductive bias
references.reason: This paper introduces a 2D state space layer, offering insights and techniques relevant to the core methodology of effectively modeling multivariate time series using 2D-SSMs.
